Residential Roofing Services in Middletown, Ohio

Woods Roofing & Exteriors is Middletown's premier residential roofing contractor with over 25 years of experience protecting homes throughout Butler County and Southwest Ohio. Our licensed and insured team specializes in complete roof replacements, repairs, and maintenance using only the highest quality materials.

Why Choose Woods Roofing for Your Middletown Home?

  • 25+ Years of Local Experience - Brandon Woods has been serving Middletown families since 1999
  • Licensed & Insured - Full liability and worker's compensation coverage
  • Insurance Claim Specialists - We work directly with your insurance company
  • Quality Materials - Premium asphalt shingles, metal roofing, and tile systems
  • Competitive Pricing - Fair, transparent pricing with detailed estimates
  • Warranty Protection - Comprehensive warranties on all residential roofing work

Our Residential Roofing Services

Complete Roof Replacements

When your Middletown home needs a new roof, we provide complete tear-off and replacement services. We work with leading manufacturers like GAF, CertainTeed, and Owens Corning to ensure your new roof withstands Ohio's harsh weather conditions.

Emergency Roof Repairs

Storm damage doesn't wait for business hours. Our emergency repair team responds quickly to protect your Middletown home from further damage with temporary tarping and permanent repairs.

Roof Maintenance & Inspections

Regular maintenance extends your roof's lifespan. We provide thorough inspections and preventive maintenance to keep your investment protected.

Roofing Materials We Install

  • Asphalt Shingles - The most popular choice for Middletown homes
  • Metal Roofing - Durable, energy-efficient, and long-lasting
  • Tile Roofing - Beautiful and weather-resistant options
  • Slate Roofing - Premium natural stone roofing

Serving Middletown & Butler County

We proudly serve homeowners throughout:

  • Middletown
  • Franklin
  • Hamilton
  • Springboro
  • Lebanon
  • Miamisburg
  • West Chester
  • Mason

Get Your Free Roofing Estimate

Ready to protect your Middletown home with a new roof? Contact Woods Roofing & Exteriors today for your free, no-obligation estimate.
